text: Mohammad Mehdi Yaghoubi (; 2 April 1930 â€“ 25 September 2021) was an Iranian bantamweight freestyle wrestler. He competed at the 1952, 1956 and 1960, Olympics and won a silver medal in 1956. Yaghoubi died on 25 September 2021, at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Iranian wrestlers Category:Olympians for Iran Category:Olympic silver medalists
title: Mehdi Yaghoubi
